column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////I travel a lot and have ate at many breakfast restaurants
column2: but this is definitely my new favorite.  Melt in your mouth Waffles and Pancakes
column3: and their Omelets are excellent.  Large portions
column4: left me wishing I had a microwave and refrigerator in my hotel room so I take my leftovers and eat them later.  10 Stars!!!!
